attributes.action: Shearing hours contract +less job seekers =make Britain's fair
attributes.additional_details: I think that what we need is all waise for new Idea or in other word every body get close but not enough, work is our right and in order this we must approve to the government our eligibility to be in the British society and not waiting for the bill to come behind our door, and for this reason the shearing hours contract will work and make more fair for the people by borrowing a minimum of hours while we looking for to be employed.
